name: RealReviews - Yotpo UGC API Service
description: Deployed on-premise to access merchant's Yotpo data.

API_KEY.description: Enter your Yotpo app key. More details on finding this are here: https://support.yotpo.com/en/article/finding-your-yotpo-app-key-and-api-secret

API_SECRET.description: Enter your Yotpo secret key. More details on finding this are here: https://support.yotpo.com/en/article/finding-your-yotpo-app-key-and-api-secret
